subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: The Olympic Truce, a good-will gesture that usually draws little notice or debate, caused an outcry at the United Nations when language drafted by Russia did not mention gay or transgender people.
snippet: The Olympic Truce, a good-will gesture that usually draws little notice or debate, caused an outcry at the United Nations when language drafted by Russia did not mention gay or transgender people.
